description.x-y:
The user absorbs its target’s HP.
The user’s HP is restored by over half
of the damage taken by the target.

effect.full: Deals regular damage.  Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.shortEffect: Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
